REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sTabelle as String Dim sDocument_Name as String Dim sBezeichnung as String,sBemerkung as String Dim oRecord1 as Object Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String
Sub SQL_delete_Serienbrief_Kontakte() sSQL1="delete from Serienbrief_Kontakte where ClientID="& iClientID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_insert_Serienbrief_Kontakte() sSQL1="insert into Serienbrief_Kontakte(ClientID,KontaktTyp,KontaktID,Anrede,Name1,Titel,Vorname,Name2,Name3,Name4,"&_ "Land,PLZ,Ort,Strasse,Hausnummer,Mindestangaben,Telefon,Funktelefon,Fax,EMail,Url,ReferenzID,Bemerkungen) "&_ "select '"& iClientID &"','"& sKontakte &"',KontaktID,Anrede,Name1,Titel,Vorname,Name2,Name3,Name4,"&_ "Land,PLZ,Ort,Strasse,Hausnummer,Mindestangaben,Telefon,Funktelefon,Fax,EMail,Url,ReferenzID,Bemerkungen "&_ "from "& sKontakte SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Serienbrief_Kontakte_keine() sSQL1="update Serienbrief_Kontakte set Serienbrief=0"&_ " where ClientID=" & iClientID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Serienbrief_Kontakte(sTabelle as String,lDocID as long) Dim sSerBrieKontaktIDs as String sSQL1="select replace(SerBrieKontakte,',',' OR KontaktID=')"&_ " from "& sTabelle &" where Option_Serienbrief=1 and DocumentID="& lDocID oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() sSerBrieKontaktIDs=oRecord1.getString(1) Wend if Len(TRIM(sSerBrieKontaktIDs)) > 0 then SQL_update_Serienbrief_Kontakte_keine() sSQL2="update Serienbrief_Kontakte set Serienbrief=1"&_ " where ClientID=" & iClientID &_ " and (KontaktID="& sSerBrieKontaktIDs &")" SQL_execute(sSQL2) End if End Sub
Sub SQL_cp_Bemerkung() sSQL1="update "& sKorrespondenz &_ " set Bemerkung='"& fBemerkung &"' where DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Steuerung_DocumentID(iOption as integer) sSQL1="update Steuerung set DocumentID="& lDocumentID_import(iOption) &_ " where ClientID="& iClientID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Steuerung_export_DocumentID(iOption as integer) sSQL1="update Steuerung set DocumentID="& lDocumentID_export(iOption) &_ " where ClientID="& iClientID_export SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_neues_Document(sDocument_Name as String,sSignum_URL as String,sSignumHeight as String,sSignumWidth as String,sGruszformel as String,sAbsender as String) sSQL1="insert into "& sKorrespondenz &_ " (Document_Name,ProjektID,KontaktID,Signum_URL,SignumHeight,SignumWidth,Gruszformel,Absender,Leerzeilen) values('"&_ sDocument_Name &"',0,0,'"&_ fsConvertBackSlash(sSignum_URL) &"','"&_ sSignumHeight &"','"&_ sSignumWidth &"','"&_ sGruszformel &"','"&_ sAbsender &"','\n\n\n\n\n')" SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_Standard_setzen(sSignum_URL as String,sSignumHeight as String,sSignumWidth as String,sGruszformel as String,sAbsender as String) sSQL1="update "& sKorrespondenz &_ " set Signum_URL='"& fsConvertBackSlash(sSignum_URL) &_ "',SignumHeight='"& sSignumHeight &_ "',SignumWidth='"& sSignumWidth &_ "',Gruszformel='"& sGruszformel &_ "',Absender='"& sAbsender &_ "' where DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_Document_Name_aendern(sDocument_Name) sSQL1="update "& sKorrespondenz &_ " set Document_Name='"& sDocument_Name &"' where DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Tabelle1_DocumentID(iOption as integer) sSQL1="update "& sKorrespondenz &" set DocumentID="& lDocumentID_import(iOption) &_ " where DocumentID="& iMax_Datensatz(sKorrespondenz,"DocumentID") SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Tabelle1_export_DocumentID(iOption as integer) sSQL1="update "& sKorrespondenz_export &" set DocumentID="& lDocumentID_export(iOption) &_ " where DocumentID="& iMax_Datensatz(sKorrespondenz_export,"DocumentID") SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Document1_Schreibschutz_1(sTabelle as String,lDocID as long) sSQL1="update "& sTabelle &_ " set Schreibschutz=1 where DocumentID="& lDocID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Document1_Gesperrt_1(sTabelle as String,lDocID as long) sSQL1="update "& sTabelle &_ " set Gesperrt="& iClientID &" where DocumentID="& lDocID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Document1_SerBrieKontakte(sTabelle as String,lDocID as long) sSQL1="update "& sTabelle &" set SerBrieKontakte='"& fstoreSerienbriefKontaktID &"' where Option_Serienbrief=1 and DocumentID="& lDocID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_Document1_Gesperrt_0(sTabelle as String,lDocID as long) sSQL1="update "& sTabelle &" set Gesperrt=0 where DocumentID="& lDocID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_DocumentID_entfernen() sSQL2="update Steuerung set DocumentID=null,DocumentID2=null where ClientID="& iClientID SQL_execute(sSQL2) End Sub
Sub SQL_update_DocumentID() sSQL2="update Steuerung set DocumentID=DocumentID2 where ClientID="& iClientID SQL_execute(sSQL2) End Sub
Sub SQL_Document_loeschen_Tabelle3() sSQL1="delete from "& sKorrespondenz &" where DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL1) End Sub
Sub SQL_Datum_setzen() sSQL2="update "& sKorrespondenz &_ " set Erstellungsdatum=(date_add(now(),interval 0 month)) where DocumentID="& lDocumentID SQL_execute(sSQL2) oForm_Document.reload End Sub
